extendedInfo.description: Download the Bar Method Android App today to plan and schedule your Bar Method classes!From this Android App you can view class schedules, sign-up for classes, view ongoing BarMethod promotions, as well as view studioâs location and contact information. Optimize yourtime and maximize the convenience of signing up for classes from your Android! Download thisApp today!Also be sure to check out our website at: http://www.barmethod.com

reviews.title: Upgrade difficult
reviews.comment: App doesn\'t function after update. Can\'t connect my account to the app, and am constantly getting messages that there was a problem connecting to the server. I\'m uninstalling it.  Update: uninstalling and re installing the app solved a lot of the issues. Seems to be working great now.
reviews.author: Alison Hopcroft

reviews.title: Works well....when it works
reviews.comment: Often the ap will say my membership doesn\'t allow me to make a reservation, even though I am on the automatic monthly membership.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not liking the new update
reviews.comment: Hating the update... Can no  longer sync to my any of calenders.... Tried downloading the google calender... Not compatible with my Android. The previous version had no issues syncing to my installed google calender or others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mindbody is poor investment...
reviews.comment: What is the point of having the app if you cannot sign up and there are continuous errors. We spent $125+ a month - invest the money in technology that makes peoples lives easier. The Bar Method\'s it systems are so out-dated that it makes for a poor customer experience.
reviews.author: SE C

reviews.title: Not very fast
reviews.comment: Takes way too long to download
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: When is the update for Mac coming to Android?!?
reviews.comment: This application loads way too slow and it is missing the ability to sign up for waitlist, look up schedule, etc. Can you work on tbjs. If it starts working like the one for the iPad, it would be perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t even sign in
reviews.comment: The login name and password i have been entering is correct but the app. Is telling me that its not. I was able to sign on using my computer. This would be such a handy app if only it worked!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waitlist?
reviews.comment: Its a great app to see who is teaching BUT the classes are often full and we can\'t get on.the wait list through app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful...
reviews.comment: I use this app all the time to book classes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Bar Method
reviews.comment: Makes adding classes SO much easier while you\'re on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works for booking and cancelling but can\'t get on wait lists. Also can\'t view personal schedule / past classes or class balance. Great to finally have an app, hope it improves over time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This so nice to have love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scheduling Only
reviews.comment: Need to be able to see my personal schedule and wait list acceptance
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bar Method Leawood
reviews.comment: Bar Method Leawood continues to exceed expectations! !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix update
reviews.comment: Uninstalled and reinstalled the app, and now it appears to work. Hopefully that does the trick.
reviews.author: mafe pineda

reviews.title: Upgrade doesn\'t work but install does
reviews.comment: Upgrade kept on crashing on my cell. Finally fixed it by uninstalling and Installing it back again
reviews.author: Beena Bhatt

reviews.title: Where\'s silver lake?
reviews.comment: What happen to the silver lake studio?
reviews.author: A Google User
